product_description: Commercial Grade 5LB Fire Extinguisher: This extinguisher features an aluminum valve with a light- to medium-duty anodized aluminum valve body and an anodized aluminum handle and lever. Designed for longevity, the extinguisher has a durable high gloss polyester powder paint with an all-metal valve construction. It chemically insulates Class A fires by melting at approximately 350°F and coats surface to which it is applied. It smothers and breaks the chain reaction of Class B fires and will not conduct electricity back to the operator. Equipped with Bilingual Labels. Heavy Duty Vehicle Bracket: Vehicle Bracket for 4.25" cylinder diameter Fire Extinguishers. All Metal Construction

product_description: Product Description Help protect your home and family with the Kidde Multi Purpose Fire Extinguisher for Home, Office, Dorm, Residential, 1A10BC, engineered to combat basic fires in your home including trash, wood, paper (Class A), liquids and gases (Class B), and electrical equipment (Class C). The simple & reliable operation is designed to combat fire hazards using the PASS (Pull, Aim, Squeeze, Sweep) firefighting method . Molded from lightweight aluminum and fitted with a simple-to-read pressure indicator, the durable valve assembly is designed for years of service. The strap bracket lets you mount the extinguisher in an easily accessible place so it’s always ready for an emergency. The easy-to-pull safety pin gives you quick access and an ergonomic, rust and impact-resistant steel handle provides a remarkably comfortable grip. Contains 2.5 lbs. of monoammonium phosphate fire-extinguishing agent. Note that the dry chemical agent in this fire extinguisher is non-toxic but may cause skin irritation. Place a fire extinguisher within easy reach and on every level of your home where fires are more likely to start. Residential, single-use only. Dispose & replace if used, discharged, or if the fire extinguisher is over 12 years old. UL Listed. 6-year limited manufacturer's warranty. From the Manufacturer Protect your home with Kidde FA110 Multi Purpose Fire Extinguisher 1A10BC. We recommend at least one fire extinguisher for every 600 square feet of living space. This fire extinguisher contains monoammonium phosphate, a dry chemical extinguishing agent that is nontoxic, inhibits re-flashing of the fire, costs less and is more effective than carbon dioxide, and is not easily dispersed by air currents. Note: Not recommended on computers or similar equipment. Easy to use on a fire: just remember the "P-A-S-S" method. Pull the pin on the fire extinguisher, Aim the fire extinguisher at the base of the fire (stand 6 feet from the fire), Squeeze the handle of the extinguisher, and Sweep the extinguisher left to right while aiming at the base of the fire.

short_description: SECURE YOUR SANCTUARY:Our fire extinguisher for home is ABC rated to tackle common fires: Class A (wood/trash), Class B (liquids/gas), and Class C (electrical). Keep one in every room for ultimate peace of mind.

KITCHEN-READY COMPACT DESIGN:Perfectly sized as a kitchen fire extinguisher, this dry chemical fire extinguisher fits easily into cabinets or under sinks. Its small fire extinguisher profile ensures professional protection is always within reach.
ROAD-TRIP ESSENTIAL:This fire extinguisher for car and truck features a heavy-duty metal body . Whether it's a jeep fire extinguisher or for a boat, it stays stable on the roughest terrains.

READY AT A GLANCE:No training required. The intuitive pressure gauge lets you know it’s ready in seconds. With an 8-12 second discharge, this small fire extinguisher provides a critical response time during emergencies.

6-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY:We stand by our quality. Each abc fire extinguisher 2.5 lb unit is built for long-term reliability and backed by a 6-year manufacturer’s limited warranty. Professional-grade safety you can trust for years to come.

TRUSTED ABC PROTECTION THAT WORKS:Rated for Class A, B, and C fires, this ABC fire extinguisher tackles grease, electric, and fuel fires. Proven in kitchens, cars, and offices. A fire extinguisher for home, car, or business that performs when it matters.

READY FOR HOME GARAGE AND CAR:Install beside your stove, keep under the sink, or place it in your garage or car trunk. This home fire extinguisher fits into daily life and works as a reliable vehicle fire extinguisher or part of any fire safety kit.

FIRE HITS FAST BE READY ALWAYS:The 2024 California wildfires and rising fire incidents remind us: fire doesn’t wait. This fire extinguisher for kitchen, hallway, or car is a backup plan for the emergencies you hope never happen—but must prepare for.

Designed for longevity, this ABC fire extinguisher features durable high-gloss polyester powder paint with an all-metal valve construction. product_description: Safeguard your commercial property with the Kidde Commercial-Grade Fire Extinguisher for Office, Schools, Rechargeable, 2A10BC, engineered to fight basic fires involving trash, paper & wood (Class A), liquids and gases (Class B), and electrical equipment (Class C). Manufactured from heavy-duty, corrosion-resistant aluminum, this fire extinguisher provides a discharge rate of 13-15 seconds, a range of 12-18 feet, and operating pressure of 100 PSI. The painted aluminum handle, aluminum cylinder, and metal valve are impact-resistant, making the Kidde Pro Fire Extinguisher dependable when you need it most. The easy-to-pull safety pin gives you quick access, designed to combat fire hazards using the PASS (Pull, Aim, Squeeze, Sweep) firefighting method. The multi-directional discharge hose allows you to fight fire from various angles. The wall hanger lets you mount the extinguisher in an easily accessible place so it’s always ready for an emergency. Designed to meet fire extinguisher compliance inspections. UL Listed. 6-year limited manufacturer's warranty. Note that the dry chemical agent in this fire extinguisher is non-toxic but may cause skin irritation. Place a fire extinguisher within easy reach where fires are more likely to start. *When compared to the Class A firefighting capability of a UL 1-A:10-B:C fire extinguisher.
